<rule id="javaee-to-jakarta-namespaces-00001" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="{*}.xml" pattern="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the Java EE namespace, schemaLocation and version with the Jakarta equivalent">
                        <message>Replace `http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee` with `https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/jakartaee` and change the schema version number </message>
                        <link href="https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/jakartaee/#10" title="Jakarta EE XML Schemas"/>
                        <quickfix name="javaee-namespaces-replace" type="REPLACE">
                            <replacement>https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/jakartaee</replacement>
                            <search>http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee</search>
                        </quickfix>
                    </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
